name: 黃增隆
objective:
本課程的主要目的是培養學生獲取數據洞察的能力。因此，本課程使用案例和相關文獻來解釋概念並指導學生分析和解讀數據。主要分為三個部分：
1. 透過案例、文獻等建立學生的消費理論與觀念；
2. 學生解讀和分析數據以獲得消費和行銷洞察；
3. 數據經理人實務經驗分享。

The primary purpose of this course is to cultivate student's ability to gain data insights. Therefore, this course uses cases and relevant literature to explain concepts and guide students to analyze and interpret data. It is mainly divided into three parts:
1. Build students' consumption theories and concepts through cases and literature;
2. Students interpret and analyze data to gain consumption and marketing insights;
3. Data managers share their practical experience.
